edu.ucdavis.cstars.client

Class OperationBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.OperationBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Add, Cut, Delete, Union, Update

    public class OperationBase
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    The OperationBase class defines operations that can be added to the UndoManager. Extend this class to create custom operations.
    Author:
    Justin Merz
